title: The Ball Valve Transformation â€“ GF Piping Systems expands its line of Pro Ball Valves - GF Piping Systems - Cision News
summary: GF Piping Systems has expanded its Pro Ball Valve line with the addition of the Ball Valve 523 Pro and Ball Valve 546 Linear Pro, designed for various industry applications like water treatment and chemical processes. These new products feature corrosion-free materials, enhanced safety features, and advanced automation capabilities, all aiming to improve functionality and operational reliability. The introduction of these valves reflects the company's commitment to combining proven materials with innovative technologies for optimal customer solutions. The products became available in July 2023, expanding options for modern valve technology.
